data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module lets you add/remove songs for your iPod, and read and
    writes the iTunes and GNUpod db formats (GNUpod being a set of
    command-line tools written in Perl, available at
    http://www.gnu.org/software/gnupod/). The Mac::iPod namespace
    already exists and contains modules (well, a module) for reading the
    iTunesDB, and this module simply extends that to cover the GNUpodDB
    and to allow for writing the iTunesDB as well. The ::GNUpod
    extension indicates the biggest specific addition this module makes,
    so it makes sense as the full name of the module.
